title: IFT
description:
IFT is an Approved Prep Provider by the Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) Institute, USA. If you intend to appear in any CFA exam you have landed on the right channel. You will find detailed & complete videos Level I readings of Ethics, Quantitative Methods, Economics, Corporate Finance, FRA, and Portfolio Management. These are updated to reflect the latest CFA Institute Level I curriculum.  Visit our website http://www.ift.world to get the remaining topic videos plus IFT study notes, IFT question bank, summary video lectures, mock exams and much more!

IFT lectures are closely aligned with curriculum which is an important consideration if you are watching to prepare for the CFA exams.
